creator: m.v.sawant@hotmail.com
text:
Calling FOP from C++ programme using JNI.

After creating PDF document FOP exits.
Control doesn't come back to calling C++ programme. Calling programme also stops execution.
start debugging, then provide some useful information
creator: gadams@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: resolved invalid due to lack of information (FO input file, PDF output file, etc)
